EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO finish registering / account (1362688888.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO finish registering / account (1362688888.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mike, Great to hear from you, please see my responses below in blue… Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mike Davis [mailto:mike.davis.sd@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 06, 2013 4:23 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Mike Davis Subject: Re: MBO finish registering / account Sara, I want to continue the process and ensure I'm formally registered, finish what's needed and include my security clearance.as I have a part-time job in the works...;-)) That’s great! couple of questions - if these are in your FAQs, I can look there... 1 - what sort of technical insurance do you recommend, to best blend with yours... is there a standard type independent contractors have? You don’t need any, you are totally covered under our policy (which I attached above.) 2 - how does the security clearance holding work? Please see this link for details. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf> 3 - What's the best way to partner with others contractors on MBO... is there a place on your portal / site that can show that? Yes, we do have a program called MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf> which is available to our members once they are active. CIAO MikeOn Fri, Feb 22, 2013 at 9:02 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Mike, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our “Independence Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Best of luck finding your next contract, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhSsAly6uqQMef%2BmxXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
